about_the_game:
Enter the battlefield of "Magic Monster Slasher", an intense round-based combat game that tests your strategic skills and quick decisions. Choose your abilities, arm yourself, and prepare to face waves of relentless enemies with only one goal: to defeat you.

Start your journey by selecting from an arsenal of different abilities and weapons. Every choice affects your path through the game, and each round brings new challenges and opportunities.

Survive the waves, level up, and adjust your strategy to become stronger. With every victory, you earn gold that you can use to buy random items. Your goal? To build an unbeatable setup that will carry you through all 20 rounds and make you the champion of the arena.

features:

Round-Based Battles: Face a growing threat in 20 challenging rounds.
Customizable Builds: Unlockable abilities, weapons, and items offer endless combination possibilities.
Progression System: Level up and improve your stats after each round.
Time and Strategy: With each round, the time and intensity of the battles increase.
Every Decision Counts: Choose wisely, because if you fall, you must start from the beginning. But with each restart, your knowledge and strategy grow.
"Magic Monster Slasher" awaits you. Are you ready to face the waves, strategize, and become the ultimate champion? The fight begins now – rise to the challenge.

content_descriptors.notes: "This game features battles within a stylized, fantastical world, where players act as knights fighting against various enemies. Despite the combat scenarios, there are no depictions of realistic violence, blood, or mutilation. All confrontations and portrayals of violence are highly stylized and take place within a fantasy context that is clearly distinct from reality."
